#summary indexof - prints the column number matching a given header, or 0 if not found.

= Usage =
`indexof <options> `

= Options =
||*Short Opt*||*Long Opt*||Arugment||Description||
||-h||--help|| ||print this message and exit||
||-V||--version|| ||print version info and exit||
||-v||--verbose|| ||print verbose messages during execution||
||-d||--delim||<delim> ||field separator string||
||-l||--label||<label> ||the header label to look for (required)||
||-f||--file||<file> ||specifies file to read (default = stdin)||
||-s||--string||<string> ||use <string> instead of a header from a file||
||-r||--row||<row> ||header line number in file (default = 1)||
----
